Now Benjamin<S>1144</S> begat<S>3205</S> Bela<S>1106</S> his firstborn<S>1060</S>, Ashbel<S>788</S> the second<S>8145</S>, and Aharah<S>315</S> the third<S>7992</S>,
Nohah<S>5119</S> the fourth<S>7243</S>, and Rapha<S>7498</S> the fifth<S>2549</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Bela<S>1106</S> were, Addar<S>146</S>, and Gera<S>1617</S>, and Abihud<S>31</S>, <sup>Addar: or, Ard.Gen.26.21</sup>
And Abishua<S>50</S>, and Naaman<S>5283</S>, and Ahoah<S>265</S>,
And Gera<S>1617</S>, and Shephuphan<S>8197</S>, and Huram<S>2361</S>. <sup>Shephuphan: or, Shupham.Num.26.39</sup>
And these are the sons<S>1121</S> of Ehud<S>261</S>: these are the heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S> of the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Geba<S>1387</S>, and they removed<S>1540</S> them to Manahath<S>4506</S>:
And Naaman<S>5283</S>, and Ahiah<S>281</S>, and Gera<S>1617</S>, he removed<S>1540</S> them, and begat<S>3205</S> Uzza<S>5798</S>, and Ahihud<S>284</S>.
And Shaharaim<S>7842</S> begat<S>3205</S> children in the country<S>7704</S> of Moab<S>4124</S>, after<S>4480</S> he had sent them away<S>7971</S>; Hushim<S>2366</S> and Baara<S>1199</S> were his wives<S>802</S>.
And he begat<S>3205</S> of Hodesh<S>2321</S> his wife<S>802</S>, Jobab<S>3103</S>, and Zibia<S>6644</S>, and Mesha<S>4331</S>, and Malcham<S>4445</S>,
And Jeuz<S>3263</S>, and Shachia<S>7634</S>, and Mirma<S>4821</S>. These were his sons<S>1121</S>, heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S>.
And of Hushim<S>2366</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Abitub<S>36</S>, and Elpaal<S>508</S>.
The sons<S>1121</S> of Elpaal<S>508</S>; Eber<S>5677</S>, and Misham<S>4936</S>, and Shamed<S>8106</S>, who built<S>1129</S> Ono<S>207</S>, and Lod<S>3850</S>, with the towns<S>1323</S> thereof:
Beriah<S>1283</S> also, and Shema<S>8087</S>, who<S>1992</S> were heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S> of the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Aijalon<S>357</S>, who drove away<S>1272</S> the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Gath<S>1661</S>:
And Ahio<S>283</S>, Shashak<S>8349</S>, and Jeremoth<S>3406</S>,
And Zebadiah<S>2069</S>, and Arad<S>6166</S>, and Ader<S>5738</S>,
And Michael<S>4317</S>, and Ispah<S>3472</S>, and Joha<S>3109</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Beriah<S>1283</S>;
And Zebadiah<S>2069</S>, and Meshullam<S>4918</S>, and Hezeki<S>2395</S>, and Heber<S>2268</S>,
Ishmerai<S>3461</S> also, and Jezliah<S>3152</S>, and Jobab<S>3103</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Elpaal<S>508</S>;
And Jakim<S>3356</S>, and Zichri<S>2147</S>, and Zabdi<S>2067</S>,
And Elienai<S>462</S>, and Zilthai<S>6769</S>, and Eliel<S>447</S>,
And Adaiah<S>5718</S>, and Beraiah<S>1256</S>, and Shimrath<S>8119</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Shimhi<S>8096</S>; <sup>Shimhi: or, Shema.vers.13</sup>
And Ishpan<S>3473</S>, and Heber<S>5677</S>, and Eliel<S>447</S>,
And Abdon<S>5658</S>, and Zichri<S>2147</S>, and Hanan<S>2605</S>,
And Hananiah<S>2608</S>, and Elam<S>5867</S>, and Antothijah<S>6070</S>,
And Iphedeiah<S>3301</S>, and Penuel<S>6439</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Shashak<S>8349</S>;
And Shamsherai<S>8125</S>, and Shehariah<S>7841</S>, and Athaliah<S>6271</S>,
And Jaresiah<S>3298</S>, and Eliah<S>452</S>, and Zichri<S>2147</S>, the sons<S>1121</S> of Jeroham<S>3395</S>.
These were heads<S>7218</S> of the fathers<S>1</S>, by their generations<S>8435</S>, chief<S>7218</S> men. These dwelt<S>3427</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>.
And at Gibeon<S>1391</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> the father<S>1</S> of Gibeon<S>1391</S> <S>25</S>; whose wife's<S>802</S> name<S>8034</S> was Maachah<S>4601</S>: <sup>father: called Jehiel,IChro.9.35</sup>
And his firstborn<S>1060</S> son<S>1121</S> Abdon<S>5658</S>, and Zur<S>6698</S>, and Kish<S>7027</S>, and Baal<S>1168</S>, and Nadab<S>5070</S>,
And Gedor<S>1446</S>, and Ahio<S>283</S>, and Zacher<S>2144</S>. <sup>Zacher: or, Zechariah.IChr.9.37</sup>
And Mikloth<S>4732</S> begat<S>3205</S> Shimeah<S>8039</S>. And these also<S>637</S> dwelt<S>3427</S> with their brethren<S>251</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, over against them<S>5048</S>. <sup>Shimeah: or, Shimeam.ca.9.38, I.Sam.14.51</sup>
And Ner<S>5369</S> begat<S>3205</S> Kish<S>7027</S>, and Kish<S>7027</S> begat<S>3205</S> Saul<S>7586</S>, and Saul<S>7586</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jonathan<S>3083</S>, and Malchishua<S>4444</S>, and Abinadab<S>41</S>, and Eshbaal<S>792</S>. <sup>Eshbaal: or, Ishbosheth 2.Sam.2.8</sup>
And the son<S>1121</S> of Jonathan<S>3083</S> was Meribbaal<S>4807</S>; and Meribbaal<S>4807</S> begat<S>3205</S> Micah<S>4318</S>. <sup>Meribbaal: or, Mephibosheth.2.Sam.4.4</sup>
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Micah<S>4318</S> were, Pithon<S>6377</S>, and Melech<S>4429</S>, and Tarea<S>8390</S>, and Ahaz<S>271</S>. <sup>Tarea: or, Tahrea.e.9.41</sup>
And Ahaz<S>271</S> begat<S>3205</S> Jehoadah<S>3085</S>; and Jehoadah<S>3085</S> begat<S>3205</S> Alemeth<S>5964</S>, and Azmaveth<S>5820</S>, and Zimri<S>2174</S>; and Zimri<S>2174</S> begat<S>3205</S> Moza<S>4162</S>,
And Moza<S>4162</S> begat<S>3205</S> Binea<S>1150</S>: Rapha<S>7498</S> was his son<S>1121</S>, Eleasah<S>501</S> his son<S>1121</S>, Azel<S>682</S> his son<S>1121</S>:
And Azel<S>682</S> had six<S>8337</S> sons<S>1121</S>, whose names<S>8034</S> are these, Azrikam<S>5840</S>, Bocheru<S>1074</S>, and Ishmael<S>3458</S>, and Sheariah<S>8187</S>, and Obadiah<S>5662</S>, and Hanan<S>2605</S>. All these were the sons<S>1121</S> of Azel<S>682</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Eshek<S>6232</S> his brother<S>251</S> were, Ulam<S>198</S> his firstborn<S>1060</S>, Jehush<S>3266</S> the second<S>8145</S>, and Eliphelet<S>467</S> the third<S>7992</S>.
And the sons<S>1121</S> of Ulam<S>198</S> were mighty<S>1368</S> men<S>582</S> of valour<S>2428</S>, archers<S>1869</S> <S>7198</S>, and had many<S>7235</S> sons<S>1121</S>, and sons'<S>1121</S> sons<S>1121</S>, an hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S>. All these are of the sons<S>1121</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>.
